about.title: About Me
about.description1: I'm an American software engineer focusing on web developement.
about.description2: I have gained experience working with various frameworks, languages, and concepts through both personal and professional projects. I constantly strive to improve and refine my skills.

about.description4: When I am not coding, I enjoy studying Japanese and have passed the JLPT N2 and Kanji Kentei Level 10 exams.
